Rulings.Edison:
●Sword of Deep-Seated's second effect is a Trigger Effect.
●If your Sangan equipped with your Sword of Deep-Seated is sent to the GY, the effect of Sangan and Sword of Deep-Seated form a Chain. You decide their order on the Chain.
●If Sword of Deep-Seated is sent to the GY while resolving Reasoning, its effect starts a new Chain after you finish resolving Reasoning.

Rulings.Base: 1. The second effect of "Sword of Deep-Seated" is a Trigger Effect.\n2. If your "Sangan" equipped with your "Sword of Deep-Seated" is sent to the GY, the effect of "Sangan" and "Sword of Deep-Seated" form a Chain. You decide their order on the Chain.\n3. If "Sword of Deep-Seated" is sent to the GY while resolving "Reasoning", its effect starts a new Chain after you finish resolving "Reasoning".
